Here's the other poll I did around a year ago. Interestingly there are far more Pro-Ukraine people, and less Pro-Russians in this channel.

Footage showing 8 consecutive Russian Geran-2 drone strikes on the Slavutych 330 kV electrical substation, as well as 1 strike on the 110 kV substation, in Kyiv Oblast. 
The footage shows strikes on:
The machine hall
2 power transformers
The oil storage
The switchgear field
330 kV coordinates: 51.52377, 30.70779
110 kV coordinates: 51.52682, 30.66776

Last night, a Russian Iskander-M ballistic missile strike was carried out on the city of Balakliya, Kharkiv Oblast. 
The strike was carried out on the "Tbiliso" restaurant in the city centre (49.45145, 36.83705). The target was likely an event for the AFU related to Ukraine's "Day of Defenders". 
This is especially likely, considering that there are no photos of the restaurant, with all footage facing away from it, even though it has been used for civilian purposes as evidenced by its recent google reviews. This would've made a good propaganda piece for Ukraine to accuse Russia of striking a civilian restaurant. 
However, due to the restaurant's proximity to surrounding apartment buildings, 1 civilian (an elderly woman) was killed, and 9 others were wounded.

Last night, a Russian Iskander-M ballistic missile strike was carried out on the city of Balakliya, Kharkiv Oblast. 
The strike was carried out on the "Tbiliso" restaurant in the city centre (49.45145, 36.83705). The target was likely an event for the AFU related to Ukraine's "Day of Defenders". 
This is especially likely, considering that there are no photos of the restaurant, with all footage facing away from it, even though it has been used for civilian purposes as evidenced by its recent google reviews. This would've made a good propaganda piece for Ukraine to accuse Russia of striking a civilian restaurant. 
However, due to the restaurant's proximity to surrounding apartment buildings, 1 civilian (an elderly woman) was killed, and 9 others were wounded.

Russian forces have captured the village of Kleban-Byk, Kostyantynivka direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~468.
Total land area: ~0.47 km¬≤.

Around 20 minutes, ~6 Iskander-K cruise missiles attacked Poltava City. Multiple explosions were heard. 
More details later.
Around 20 minutes, ~6 Iskander-K cruise missiles attacked Poltava City. Multiple explosions were heard.   More details later.

Poltava oblast has been hit very hard. ~23 ballistic and cruise missiles were used, with most impacting. 
I will make a more detailed report when I get home.

Last night, another combined Russian missile and drone attack was carried out on Ukraine. 
Missiles launched:
~5 Iskander-K cruise missiles from OTRK installations in the vicinity of Melitopol, Zaporizhzhia Oblast.
~3 Iskander-K cruise missiles from OTRK installations at/near Millerovo Airbase, Rostov Oblast.
~6 Iskander-K cruise missiles from OTRK installations at/near Khalino Airbase, Kursk Oblast.
~2 Kh-59 cruise missiles from Su-34s at the launch lines south of Stary Oskol, Belgorod Oblast.
~1 Kh-59 cruise missiles from a Su-34 at the launch lines in the vicinity of Taganrog, Rostov Oblast.
~1 Iskander-M ballistic missile from an OTRK installation at Millerovo Airbase, Rostov Oblast.
~2 Iskander-M ballistic missiles from OTRK installations in the vicinity of Bryansk City, Bryansk Oblast.
~4 Iskander-M ballistic missiles from OTRK installations at/near Khalino Airbase, Kursk Oblast. 
The two main targets were Poltava City, and the Yablunivske Gas Processing Branch in northern Poltava Oblast (50.2255, 33.40209). 
Interception rates are unknown, but it's known that all Iskander-Ms and the vast majority of cruise missiles hit their targets.  
Additionally, the true number of cruise missiles is likely higher. This report + map only shows the number of aerial targets detected.

 Graphic: This morning, clashes occurred in Khan Yunis between Hamas and the Al-Mujaida clan. 
Five Hamas vehicles, which had departed from Nasser Hospital to attack the Mujaida neighbourhood, were destroyed by the IDF.
Hamad Abu Haldan, a senior Hamas commander in Khan Yunis, was killed during the strikes.
The clashes follow allegations that Hamas‚Äôs Saham unit targeted the clan overnight, accusing them of aiding Israel and cooperating with Israel-linked groups in Rafah and Khan Yunis. 
Footage shows the bodies of the Hamas fighters left by the Mujaida Clan.
@wfwitness

Changes on the frontline in Ukraine for September 2025:
Yellow = Russian advances
Light blue = Ukrainian advances
Russian advances:
Donetsk Oblast: ~245.46 km¬≤
Luhansk Oblast: ~15.42 km¬≤
Kharkiv Oblast: ~42.55 km¬≤
Dnipropetrovsk Oblast: ~109.29 km¬≤
Zaporizhzhia Oblast: ~90.68 km¬≤
Sumy Oblast: ~1.14 km¬≤
Belgorod Oblast: ~2.86 km¬≤
Total: ~507.40 km¬≤ (down by 10.06%)
Total (excluding Kursk & Belgorod): ~504.54 km¬≤
Ukrainian advances:
Donetsk Oblast: ~38.49 km¬≤
Kharkiv Oblast: ~19.83 km¬≤
Luhansk Oblast: ~2.76 km¬≤
Sumy Oblast: ~11.15 km¬≤
Total: ~72.23 km¬≤ (up by 6.17%).
Note: This covers net gains for each side. Ukrainian advances that took place on territory Russia occupied within this month will simply be subtracted from the Russian total, and vice versa.

Russian forces have captured the village of Verbove, Pokrovske direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~236.
Total land area: ~0.85 km¬≤.

Due to the critical situation with Ukraine's power grid in Sumy and Chernihiv Oblasts following intensified Russian drone and missile strikes, rolling power outages will begin in both regions, with some users experiencing up to 67% of the day without electricity.

Analysis on the Pokrovske-Prosyana direction (Part 1):  Since the fall of Vuhledar, Russian forces have been carrying out a concerted effort to collapse and capture the rest of Ukrainian-controlled south Donetsk Oblast. Now with that goal almost completed‚Ä¶

Over the past two months, Russian forces have made consistent progress towards the town of Pokrovske in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast, largely matching my prediction in 
this analysis
 from 1 month ago.
They have advanced around 21 km from Vilne Pole to Verbove, putting them just 13.4 km from the crucial logistical hub of Pokrovske. 
As I said last month, the goal of this offensive is likely to eventually bypass the stronghold city of Hulyaipole (Zaporizhzhia Oblast), taking it into a pocket.

A Ukrainian An-196 UAV impacted the Orsknefteorgsintez oil refinery in the city of Orsk, Orenburg Oblast, around 1500 km from the nearest Ukrainian-controlled territory. 
The target was the LCH-24-2000 gasoline and diesel hydrofining unit.
Coordinates: 51.249616, 58.519125

A Ukrainian An-196 UAV impacted the Orsknefteorgsintez oil refinery in the city of Orsk, Orenburg Oblast, around 1500 km from the nearest Ukrainian-controlled territory.

Hamas has agreed to immediately enter negotiations to end the war in Gaza, after stating its readiness to release all remaining dead and alive hostages in return for the release of thousands of Palestinian prisoners. 
IDF activity in the Gaza Strip has significantly decreased over the past couple of hours, after the chief of staff convened a special situation assessment where Israel has "advanced readiness for the implementation of the first phase of the Trump plan". 
Trump stated on Truth Social that Hamas is ready for a "lasting peace" and called on Israel to stop bombing Gaza so that hostages can be safely released.
